Our proven methodology

A systematic approach that guarantees measurable and lasting results.

Reconnaissance

1-2 weeks

Comprehensive digital perimeter analysis, asset identification, and attack surface mapping.

Pentesting

2-4 weeks

Controlled penetration testing following OWASP and NIST methodologies.

Implementation

3-6 weeks

Deployment of corrective measures, system hardening, and security control configuration.

Maintenance

Ongoing

Continuous monitoring, security updates, and proactive response to new threats.
